name: Halterman Aviation LLC
about: Halterman Aviation LLC, located at North Texas Regional Airport in Denison, Texas, is a premier flight training institution specializing in Kitfox-specific flight training and tailwheel instruction. As a Part 61 FAA-certified flight school, we offer comprehensive flight and ground training programs. Our expert instructors provide personalized attention to ensure students achieve their aviation goals. We also offer aircraft rentals, catering to a variety of training needs. With a focus on transitioning pilots to advanced aircraft, Halterman Aviation is committed to delivering the highest level of professional flight instruction. Our dedicated team is here to help you take to the skies with confidence.
